This website is currently under construction.

Kilian Sander is a research fellow at <a href="https://www.hml.hmtm-hannover.de/">Hanover Music Lab</a>.

He is also editorial assistant at the <a href="https://jbdgm.psychopen.eu/index.php/JBDGM/editorial_team">Jahrbuch Musikpsychologie</a>.

You can find him on <a href="https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=NsY6jwkAAAAJ&hl=de&oi=ao">Google Scholar</a> and with his <a href="https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3770-7483">ORCiD</a> or follow him on
<a href="https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Kilian-Sander">Research Gate</a>.
